title: Moving
body: <p>I'll probably not be posting anything until the 30th when I get DSL at the new place, but I'll most likely keep my computer on till the 27th or so.  I think that'll be one of the <a href="http://uptime.netcraft.com/up/graph/?mode_u=off&amp;mode_w=on&amp;submit=Examine&amp;site=travis.servebeer.com" title="look at all those reboots in my uptime">longest downtimes</a> I've had in awhile.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-09-24

Moving

bodyNavItems.text: Peace has been restored in Iraq (for several minutes now)
